result.arabic_text: وَقُلۡنَا مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ لِبَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ ٱسۡكُنُواْ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ فَإِذَا جَآءَ وَعۡدُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ جِئۡنَا بِكُمۡ لَفِيفٗا
result.translation: 104. Waxaana ku nidhi Ilmihii Israa’iil (Fircoon) kadambow: Dega dhulka (Shaam - Falastiin), markase uu yimaado yabooha nolosha dambe (ee Qiyaamaha) inuu fulo. Waxaan idin keeni dhammaan (banka Qiyaamaha si la idiinla xisaabtamo).
